text: Gelechiinae is a subfamily of moths in the family Gelechiidae. It was described by Henry Tibbats Stainton in 1854. ==Taxonomy== The subfamily includes the following tribes and genera: *Teleiodini Piskunov, 1973 **Agnippe Chambers, 1872 **Altenia Sattler, 1960
